notice.title: Notice Regarding Credit Transfer
notice.audience: All students of NIT and HIT Agartala
instructions: Students are required to register on both the ABC and NAD portals: https://www.abc.gov.in/ and https://nad.digilocker.gov.in/
Registration generates ABC and NAD IDs, which must be shared using the form: https://forms.gle/IQV686XqzaLTvTsB9
Once IDs are updated in MIS, students can apply for credit transfer through the ABC portal
Credit transfer requests must be submitted using the attached form and endorsed by the HoD
Students cannot opt for credit transfer of more than 10% of total credits required for their course
Students with backlogs are not eligible to apply for credit transfer
Students must maintain required attendance for courses at the host institute
